pageContext.claim: “You know, I hear so much about, ‘the wall is old-fashioned.’ No, the wall is not old-fashioned. The wall is 100 percent foolproof.”
pageContext.analysis: This doesn't track with reality. It's well known that drug cartels and others dig tunnels to get through the border in some cases. Most people immigrating to the United States illegally are overstaying their visas. A wall would make no difference for them.
